source.original_note: Grok attempted reproduction using QuTiP and observed uniform distribution; requested exact Qiskit code because original showed bias toward '111' (~26%).

artifact.description: Reproduction circuit initializing a custom 3-qubit state where P(|111>) = 0.26, others equal.

notes: This SAM record binds Grok's public observation to a reproducible Qiskit artifact. For on-chain or IPFS anchoring, compute file hashes and register them via the provided hash script.
